title: Zizo_AlgoX
description: A futuristic algorithmic trading platform with real-time dashboards, AI-powered signal analysis, and back-testing capabilities against historical market data.
features: Real-time data visualization with candlestick charts
Secure user authentication and portfolio management

title: Zizo_NetSentinel
description: A cutting-edge cybersecurity dashboard that provides network monitoring, threat detection, and automated incident response using machine learning.
features: Live network traffic analysis and visualization

title: Zizo_HealthVerse
description: A proof-of-concept for a decentralized electronic health record (EHR) system utilizing blockchain for enhanced patient data security and privacy.
features: Immutable and tamper-proof patient records on a private blockchain
Interoperability layer for seamless data exchange between providers

title: Zizo_GenArt Engine
description: An experimental platform for creating generative art using custom-trained GANs and diffusion models, controlled via a futuristic UI.
features: Fine-tuning controls for art style, color palettes, and composition
Interactive canvas for real-time art manipulation

title: Zizo_AI Voice Assistant
description: A custom voice assistant prototype designed for controlling smart home devices and personal productivity, with a focus on natural language understanding.
features: Natural language processing for complex commands
Personalized daily briefings and task management
